name: Television Propaganda
text: After some discussion, some of your council members have came up with an idea of placing propaganda into television to increase loyalty in our nation.

choices.text: Yes, this would be great for our nation...
triggeredUniques: [+15]% unhappiness from the number of cities

choices.text: No, television shouldn't be used for propaganda.
triggeredUniques: [+1 Happiness, +1 Gold] per [3] population [in all cities

name: A Place to Live
text: After the discovery of Fishing, your people are divided on if we should start living by the rivers, or the coastline...

choices.text: We should live by the Rivers..!
triggeredUniques: [+1 Food, +2 Production] in cities on [Fresh Water] tiles

choices.text: We should live by the Coast..!
triggeredUniques: [+1 Food, +2 Gold] in cities on [Coastal] tiles

name: First Earthquake
text: The earth shook today, cracking multiple structures. with everyone terrified and confused of what happened, you come up with two ideas.

choices.text: It's a warning from the Gods, we must find a way to calm them...
The earth is collapsing, we need to reduce our taking of resources from the earth...

name: High Populous
text: Now that our population is growing quickly, you've come up with ideas on what to do with them...

choices.text: Some of our Populous are willing to sell themselves as slaves to leave poverty, maybe they could be useful.
They might make good sacrifices for our society...
If we don't want them here, take them somewhere elsewhere!

name: Blight
text: A new disease named 'The Blight' has ravaged our population. Even though that the disease is new and small at the moment, civilians are terrified of what may come of it.

choices.text: We have done much wrong, and now God created this disease for punishment, we need to punish ourselves for redemption..!
We need to learn about this 'Blight' more closely, new ways of treatment may help...
Our number of sacrifices are pathetic... We need more for better protection of the Gods.

name: Abolishing Slavery
text: Now that freedom is becoming a more important topic, some people have thought of the idea of abolishing slavery to make all men free!

choices.text: The Abolishon of slavery would be a great way to influence the world to our freedom.
No, Abolishing slavery would be devastating to our production, we shouldn't...
